message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway at $15000. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $13500. This is my best offer so far, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $11000 for it. Can you accept this price?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out on a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $12500. This is my final offer, and I'm not going any lower.
I've made a serious offer of $11000, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price. Can you accept it?
